events.title: Welcome
events.description: We're looking forward to an exciting week and weekend at the 73nd NW Buddhist Convention and National Concuil Meeting. Use this app to view the schedule, see info about the ministers and community speakers.

events.title: Sing Namo Amida Butsu
events.description: Please click the "Session Link" to access the session material. If the website is not responding, please press the bottom right button and select "Open in Safari"
